definition: An initiation ceremony marking the 13th birthday of a Jewish girl.
opposite_reasoning: BatMitzvah is a highly specific cultural-religious ceremony without a true antonym. This opposition is intuitive, likely to exist in both WordNet and SUMO, and creates a meaningful axis for Fisher-LDA. While not directly relevant to AI safety/deception detection, it provides the cleanest semantic contrast for this concept.
